0: My high heels needed repair and for less that 10USD the concierge arranged for the shoe maker to pick up fix and return to my room within hours
Beware that breakfast restaurant is currently undergoing renovation so on the weekend I waited for about 20 minutes to get a table
Some rooms updated with very slightly better double beds rarely a queen size
During the day there was repairs in other rooms which caused a significant amount of noise
My room fixtures were shabby and had suffered through years of use with no attention or updating evident
It would be good to update the diversity for the breakfast
The hotel is undergoing renovation at the moment and there is no air conditioning in the room
Unfortunately there was renovation work in the upper floors not pre announced
The hotel is undergoing renovations when we were there and we do see the need to upgrade some of the technology niceties like TVs USB charging points etc
1: The renovation of the rooms at Grand Hyat Seoul has been quite well done
Dedicated friendly and well informed staff beautiful and mostly renovated rooms excellent food and a stunning view over Seoul
Beautiful facilities conveniently located room details could be updated and improved
After going through renovations the hotel feels more grand and glamorous than before
generally good place to stay and restaurants need renovation badly
Stayed in the renovated room and noticed the addition of Korean elements like the light grey tiles in the bathroom which differentiates the rooms from other Hyat hotels
My room on the renovated 14th floor was great but it was the seminar facilities that were truly memorable
Rooms have been renovated so they are all well appointed and I ’ve never had any issue with noise
